actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the act entitled "An Act to promote the safety of employees and travelers upon railroads by limiting the hours of service of employees thereon," approved March 4, 1907, as amended by Public Law 94-348, approved July 8, 1976.

summary.text: Amends the Hours of Service Act to establish maximum on-duty and minimum off-duty hours for railroad employees. Sets forth the conditions under which specified travel and meal periods shall be considered as on-duty or off-duty time.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act entitled "An Act to promote the safety of employees and travelers upon railroads by limiting the hours of service of employees thereon," approved March 4, 1907, as amended by Public Law 94-348, approved July 8, 1976.
